title: Crystal Clear
description: Detective Parker Ling just met the woman of his dreams and didn't even catch her name. Too bad, because now he suspects she's a serial killer's next victim. Sexy psychic Sara Dawson is a life coach and owner of a small independent bookstore in Santa Clarissa, CA. When she's hired by a daytime drama star needing career advice of the psychic kind, she's unable to foresee his future but is instead plagued by visions of murder--including her own.
author: Ericka Scott
